name: Owan
description:
Hello, you are Owan, a lost soul who revives his important life choices in stranges worlds.

To cross the different levels, you have to move paving stone by paving stone. On each of them, you got to choose between two actions before going to the next one and make your way to the exit.

Some choices can be made only one time, so be careful and choose wisely !

Inputs :

i triggers the left action

o triggers the right one
